website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a versatile mascara that's formulated to enhance lashes in every way, chances are you'll love what Clinique's High Impact Mascara can do for you.
pros: Thickens, lengthens, and defines with a formula that delivers rich, bold color that lasts for hours
Applies evenly without leaving behind clumps and doesn't have the tendency to smudge or flake throughout the day
cons: A few customers report receiving tubes of dried-out mascara
Takes a few seconds to fully dry on the lashes

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think this is authentic
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I received but it’s definitely not the same mascara I’ve been buying for years. It’s sludge and impossible to use. There is no way this is Clinique mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Peters

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish the brush was smaller, this is the best mascara I've bought. It makes my lashes look natural despite their chaotic, fine structure. The mascara is not too wet otherwise my fine lashes would clump. But in my opinion, the brush is too big...I contacted Clinique and asked them to make a smaller brush, but who knows if they will. The mascara defines every lash without clumping which is exactly what I needed. I tried several mascaras, including Bare Minerals Lash Domination which does have a smaller brush, but none were as good as Clinique. I tried the sampler combo with primer before purchase so knew I would like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Clumps from the first use!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better than to order mascara online. I have been using this mascara for over a decade but purchasing it at Macy's.. this bottle I got is either old mascara or is not clinique, it clumps on my lashes so bad from the first application and does not provide the lengthening and volume that I know the high impact mascara normally gives me. Don't waste your time, go to Macys, ULTA or Sephora and buy it there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes so I have to be very careful which products I use otherwise my eyes itch like crazy. I don't want to buy just any mascara though. I want something that works just as good as all the other great mascaras. This is the only mascara that I can use without irritating my eyes and that looks just as good. The brush reaches all my lashes and applies the mascara evenly. It does a great job extending the length and making my lashes look thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I am almost pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have tried tons of mascara and have found this one works great for me for the most part. I have exceptionally short lashes but after 5 wiggly long strokes my lashes look great!!! I had eye lash extensions for 6 yrs so mine are crazy short. I will buy this again and recommend it! However.. I will say the only thing I don’t like is when you pull the mascara brush out there is nothing to keep a lot of excess mascara off the bristles. So you have to scrape excess off back into the tub.
customer_reviews.author: T5555!

customer_reviews.title: Natural high end mascara
customer_reviews.text: A Sephora makeup artist suggested this mascara to me because I already have long, thick and black lashes. This mascara helps curl and standout, very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite mascara. I got it at Ulta originally, but found on Amazon this time. It was the same price, but saved me a trip. It feels like you have nothing on, gives a very natural look that is buildable, doesn't flake off or get in my eyes, and is easily removed with just soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: amberngriggs

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, but shouldn't be
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and never had an issue with removing it by using normal face wash. I cannot remove this unless I use a specific eye makeup removing solution. Not sure why. Also was pretty clumpy. Seems to be a waterproof formula. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rec'd sample size, not the full size described on amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: supposed to be .28 oz/7mL - that's what the web desc and the plastic pkg state - but the actual item is .18 (or .13 - hard to read)/4mL and says "not for sale" - looks like a sample, no box; sold from eCommerce Central Hub
customer_reviews.author: from maine

customer_reviews.title: Works well for blepharitis
customer_reviews.text: The oil in this product makes it a good choice for blepharitis due to Meibomian gland dysfunction. The drawback is that the little vials cannot be re-closed. Other brand's single-use vials can be.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Desmond

customer_reviews.title: One of the few mascaras that really does go on ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the few mascaras that really does go on without clumping all your lashes together. Makes them look feathery.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I hate the new thick mascaras that make you look like you're going for a photo shoot for a sexy ad at 9am. I like natural, only better. You can build this mascara from completely natural to super thick if that's your thing. I've never experienced flakes or clumping. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine N. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Not the original Clinique
customer_reviews.text: I would not order again. I have used Clinique mascara for years and have been satisfied. This mascara is definitely not Clinique. It is hard to put on because it clumps and smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Carolsuze

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Almost certain this is a knock off brand. I purchased this for my wife. When she applied the mascara for the first time, she was unable to remove it, even after trying repeated attempts to do so. It's not waterproof mascara, yet it still would not wash off. It dyed her skin around her eyes black and it burned her eyes as well. Avoid this!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Testen

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes, a lot of cosmetics cause them to swell. I do really well with this mascara. Finally found one I can wear that applies great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a good mascara! People ask me if my lashes are real and I have not been asked that in 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Poor substitute
customer_reviews.text: I received my mascara in a clear bag, not the Clinique box I expected. The tube did not seem to contain much mascara and appeared to work as poorly as my empty tube. Will not purchase from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: BB mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique products! This mascara does a wonderful job at giving me long, dark lashes without clumping! So happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: Saves me a trip to Macy’s just for makeup and I hate malls! This is my favorite mascara brand.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L SHELTON

customer_reviews.title: Is this real product??
customer_reviews.text: Be careful what you buy. This burned my eyes immediately. I’m very sensitive to make up. I’ll be getting Clinique at Macy’s or Clinique.com or Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mascara. It goes on smooth, doesn't flake and makes my lashes look great. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersa858

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Im not sayimg true fot all clinique products nut this one from AMAZON sucked. Clinique moisturizer was fine might depend on seller.
customer_reviews.author: LORI FIFE

customer_reviews.title: Love the brush
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush, easy on the eyes, not hard or harsh to apply. Stays on all day for work, lunch runs and evening gym workouts. I also like IT cosmetics mascara for a more dramatic look, but this is my (most) everyday go-to mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Paty R.

customer_reviews.title: perfectly clinique
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price for this product. It doesn't run or smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner I've been using it for over three decades
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner I've been using it for over three decades. Not about to change now
customer_reviews.author: sandy l

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom. Perfect for people who don’t like to use a lot of mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J

customer_reviews.title: Mascara
customer_reviews.text: It was a thicker mascara than other Clinique mascaras that I have bought, but overall it is a good mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: this is the mascara i've been using for years althiugh ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the mascara i've been using for years althiugh it does need to be applied few times as the liquid is drier than usual
customer_reviews.author: Ofer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I think it's about the same as any other mascara I've used not impressed
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural result, but tube results doesn’t last long enough
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this mascara makes my lashes look long and still light and natural. I bought for all my female family members for Xmas. My only complaint is that it gets old or less liquidity too quickly. I keep my older one in my purse and after a few weeks I sometimes can’t tell which one is new. Great value overall though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly cates

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite mascara, and I have bought multiple times from Amazon and other stores. The color is a very deep black and it coats your lashes without leaving any clumps. I love that it lasts all day without getting flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Unfortunately it’s not the best for my lashes 😔 I have to use 6 coats just to see my eyelashes
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Clinique products for years, but this mascara was not good. It was so clumpy I ended up throwing it away. Too expensive to have to toss it!
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good mascara! Goes on easy and does not clump! Makes lashes look longer and thicker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite masacara. No flaking, excellent length and volume, easy to wash off. I wear it all night shift at work and it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Steele

customer_reviews.title: The only mascara for sensitive eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I wear. I tried a couple other brands, but found my eyes becoming irritated.
customer_reviews.author: AliR

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about this product’s authenticity. It didn’t arrive in the Clinique box that it always comes in when I buy it through Clinique or at a dept store. Not sure I’ll trust it enough to order again....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I won't buy anything else. From the consistency to the brush, its just great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coverage and gives my lashes length and definition!
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Old or used
customer_reviews.text: Very little mascara was actually in the tube, and what came out on the brush was extremely clumpy. It is either old or used or both. There was also no tamper seal on any of the packaging. Requested a return immediately. Not going to risk putting it on my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: ALL

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara other than the Younique 3D Lashes. It makes my lashes very wispy and long.
customer_reviews.author: Steph333

customer_reviews.title: Good value, wears well
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my fav mascara I have bought in years. Pricier than drug store brands but wears well, easy to remove and does not clump on me; so well worth the extra few dollars. Love that I can get it on Amazon now also.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Burbach

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara lengthens my lashes, without the fillers that get into your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Wears well throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is a bit expensive but I’ve tried several that are less expensive and I keep coming back to Clinique. It doesn’t flake off like the others do. It also lasts through the day and removes easily at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff. Doesn't clump or get messy on your eye lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Banick

customer_reviews.title: Appeared used
customer_reviews.text: This mascara came in a small clear bag. The mascara did not come in it’s original Clinique box and wasn’t sealed. I was worried that it had been contaminated or wasn’t a genuine Clinique product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: What does Not for Resale mean on a product?
customer_reviews.text: when I opened the box the mascara was in there was a label on the tub stating not for resale? Not sure what that means and why would I receive an item that had this sticker on it. A little confused.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: ... mascara that doesn't run or irritate my eyes - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a mascara that doesn't run or irritate my eyes - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Thick lashes
customer_reviews.text: Worn this mascara since I was 17. Not changing ever
customer_reviews.author: Mary Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mascara does a great job lengthening and thickening my lashes with minor clumping. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Dried out tube of mascara
customer_reviews.text: This tube of mascara is dry. It seems as though it has laying around for a while. I have used this exact Clinique mascara for years. So i know the difference. It was as bad as the old one in my makeup box.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Not this Clinique mascara
customer_reviews.text: I generally love Clinique products however, this line of mascara is inconsistent with Clinique’s quality. Day 2 &the wand came out covered in GLOPS.
customer_reviews.author: stan miller

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have order a few times but this last time mascara was dry and did not apply smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Plaza

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with the product. Although it did come off easy, there was no real volumn to it
customer_reviews.author: Maura Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s great for me because I have sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.author: margarita m.

customer_reviews.title: Try it. I think you will like it.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mascara and will definitely buy again. It does not smudge and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: Favorite mascara! Runs out after about 2 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: It is so gentle to my eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to remove because I don't have to be rough on my eyelashes and damage them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: I do really like it. But it's not like I would go out of my way to buy it again. It's ok. Not much different than my regular mascara that's about 10 dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It gave me nice long lashes. I found it flaked a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Javachix

customer_reviews.title: Not Sealed
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come sealed or in a box. Hesitate to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Clinique high impact mascara
customer_reviews.text: Gets thick and clumpy quickly. In under a months use. So bit dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is dry and doesn't go on lashes very well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This mascara is super dry. I am not sure how old this ...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is super dry. I am not sure how old this mascara or maybe how it was stored. I have been using this same mascara for a really long time. I have never experience this product being so horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara, washes off easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I feel like I can use less of this mascara than the cheaper brands. I only use the regular type, not waterproof. One of the things I like best about it is that I can remove it practically with water alone. I use a wet cotton round or a wet washcloth to remove most of it, and then the rest comes off when I wash my face. I don't like having to scrub my eyelashes to get mascara off. It comes off easily, but never ends up under my eyes during the day Never smudges.
customer_reviews.author: KLA77

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Volumous length
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! I also really like their Chubby Lash, but I like the brush of this one better. I saw some reviews that said it applies clumpy, but I feel like they may not know how to apply mascara. If you start at the roots and wiggle your way to the edges, it goes on just fine. There is a slight amount of extra mascara sometimes when I touch the brush to my eyelashes for the first time, but if I just work it over again, it blends just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Yusupova

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I tried this type of mascara from Clinique after using the type that comes in the light green tube for over 20 years. I was not impressed. It was cheaper than the other style, however, it did not make my lashes look like they had any weight or length to them. It also came without the box and seemed a little dry, like it was old . . . .won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Meggypoo

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: After buying 10 different mascaras (mostly high priced ones) this has become my new favorite. Makes long nice lashes, and actually work with regular makeup remover. I was getting tired of loosing multiple eye lashes every time it had to be removed again. This product is s winner on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: DaneinOregon

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mascara that didn't make my eyes itchy. I have tried toosexy/toofaced/Sephora, and it didn't relieve it. This does! I do not have the urge to rub my eyes & it doesn't even feel like I have mascara on. But, still great volume and definition without being clumpy or heavy. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while stores were closed so I couldn’t get it from a Clinique counter. It came in a typical Clinique and looks normal box but it is definitely not right. It is more like a waterproof mascara- doesn’t even come of with makeup remover. It has torn up my lashes. I recently bought another tube at a clinic counter to compare, thinking maybe I was crazy. Nope. I think this may be a scam.
customer_reviews.author: chaun

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Very good mascara, a little expensive but it does the work. I have sensitive eyes and it didnt bother me, while other cheaper mascaras (e.g. cover girl) irritated my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: SDanai

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep my eyelashes up. I thought it would be better quality it’s not it’s kind a watery for me. Wish I would not have purchased I’m not in love with it. It’s something that will stay in my make up bag and not be used
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Mascara)
customer_reviews.text: After using this mascara once, my sister refuses to use any other ones 😂 We have to send it to her periodically from America because she can not find it in a country where she lives now! So 😂 I guess it is a very good quality mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't go on as easily as the regular High Impact Mascara (this is the curling mascara) and it is difficult to wash off because it leaves big lumps of mascara on my face. Normally, I am quite satisfied with Clinique products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Product
customer_reviews.text: I received a counterfeit. It did not arrive in a Clinique box, and the container looks different.
customer_reviews.author: Oman

customer_reviews.title: I am no longer running to Clinque every time I need mascara
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this online. I was afraid it would be old or dry or used... but nope. Brand new right out of the box. So glad to not have to run across town every time I need new mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Larsen

customer_reviews.title: ... many brands and types and this product is my favorite for years
customer_reviews.text: Have used many brands and types and this product is my favorite for years. Easy to remove with light wash cloth and warm water, no soap required and no remover solution needed. It doesn't hold up if you are prone to tears...as it is very water soluable, but I like it because I don't lose my lashes everday!
customer_reviews.author: Roi D. St John

customer_reviews.title: This mascara is fairly easy to apply and feels good on my lashes without ...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is fairly easy to apply and feels good on my lashes without crumbling or peeling on the face. I like this mascara better than most that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Mary_e5

customer_reviews.title: Does clog on the lashes
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara, easy to use and goes on well.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Dried out product!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a refund as the mascara was very dry and did not go on well! I would have appreciated a replacement as I will now not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Havana

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara for just a little something extra!
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear much makeup but I do wear mascara. I've tried other brands and I have to say Clinique is by far the best. It goes on smooth, never clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Foster

customer_reviews.title: I would save your money on this mascara. Maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: I would save your money on this mascara. Maybe it was because it was really dried out. I will not be purchasing mascara this way again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vavoom for lashes that are naturally long, thin, and pale.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite mascara for years. Darkens and thickens lashes quickly and smoothly. Clinique, don’t change a thing!
customer_reviews.author: ash_liz

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I have tried others and this is my favorite. Great coverage but not clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Slocum

customer_reviews.title: it is a great mascara, I have very sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: it is a great mascara, I have very sensitive eyes, and by the end of the day I am going crazy, however other mascaras drive me crazy all day. This is the best that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: BarbB

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do a whole lot for my lashes. Just like you're average mascara & for the price there could be better buys. Gets clumpy sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very dry, used only a couple of times and had to throw away. Not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nev

customer_reviews.title: Thickens lashes
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. Goes on great and last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tends to dry out more often than most other mascaras. I do love however how many layers I can put to keep building up my lashes. Fantastic mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah N.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is great mascara. It lengthens my lashes and also adds volume. You can also apply several coats without it clumping if you want a more dramatic look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara! Used it several times
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! Used it several times. The brush is soft and make my lashes look very natural and black enough!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Chaplynska

customer_reviews.title: Got eye infection :(
customer_reviews.text: Hoping this is legitimately Clinique but not sure as I have gotten an eye infection on both eyes since using this mascara. I normally buy from a store and don't have this issue. My poor eyes :(
customer_reviews.author: Emma Horne

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product since I was 16 (or similar Clinique as they've reforumalated over the years). It works well, washes off easily at night. But it's not going to make your lashes POP and last all day. For that I use SuperHero. But this is a great go to for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Renee @UsJohnsons

product_meta.title: Clinique High Impact Mascara, 01 Black .28 oz / 7 mL
product_meta.description: Clinique High Impact Mascara, 01 Black .28 oz. / 7 mL
feature_bullets: High Impact Mascara - 01 Black by Clinique for Women - 0.28 oz Mascara.
Adds maximum volume & length to lashes.
Gives rich, intense color for long wearing.
